title: An Act relative to health equity and community health workers

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Kennedy, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 251) of Robyn K. Kennedy for legislation relative to health equity and community health workers.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.
